dict.string:
XBMCnfoTVImporter (V 1.1-93)

is an agent to import the local metadata XBMC creates when you export your library to separate files. Series and season poster, fanart and thumbs will be recognized, if they are saved alongside your series in the series and season folders. XBMC naming conventions apply. So don't expect it to work, if your naming doesn't follow them.
